page.title: 08RELIGION
page.content: St.Mary's church,in the village,was built in the 12th century,although the tower was added in 1858. The church is one of three that form Hih Ongar Parish. Two services are held on a Sunday. In the Autumn of 1985 the vicar is hoping to start a Sunday schoolfor the younger members of the community.Apart from the church services,the vicar holds many prayer groups in the homes of the local people.The vicars day if varied,with no two days identical.He has the services to hold and is also involved in the life of the community.He visits the older members of the communitywhen they are ill,whether they are in hospital or in their own homes.He also is involved with the local Senior Citizens Club.Another important job is to look after the maintenance of the church.
